name: Letterman
overview: Letterman is a 1-2 player hangman game for the 8-bit Atari computer. The player must try to solve a word by filling in the blanks before the apple sitting atop a person's head is hit with an arrow. Players can chose a random word or can use their own words. Every incorrect answer causes the arrow to approach closer. Players can choose from 3 different levels of difficulty, and can play with or without hints. There is an option for a time limit to games.
